price: Kuma idan ka bi mafiya yawan waɗanda suke a cikin ƙasa da ɗã'a sunã ɓatar da kai daga hanyar Allah. Ba su bin kõme sai fãce ƙaddari-faɗi* suke yi.
arabic: وَإِن تُطِعۡ أَكۡثَرَ مَن فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ يُضِلُّوكَ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِۚ إِن يَتَّبِعُونَ إِلَّا ٱلظَّنَّ وَإِنۡ هُمۡ إِلَّا يَخۡرُصُونَ
footnotes: * Kamar maganarsu cewa mũshe wanda Allah da kansa Ya kashe, ya fi dã cewa da a ci shi, bisa ga abin da mutãne suka yanka.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
